project.name: Stillingar - XML Beans XPath enhancement
project.description:
Stillingar is a configuration framework for Java applications. It supports runtime reloading of configuration files, which can consist of XML or properties files. When used in a Spring environment, configuration values can be autowired by expression or if XMLBeans/JAXB are used, by type.
This module provides an XPath implementation for XMLBeans that is based on the XPath engine that is included in Java5+. Hopefully future XMLBeans implementations will provide this by default. In which case, this module can be ignored.
Note that this functionality is deliberately separated from stillingar-xmlbeans, as the XPath implementation provided here will potentially override any other implementation (at least the default) within in the same JVM. If you would prefer to use the Saxon based XPath implementation then DO NOT include this module as a dependency.
